content.raw:
Error case:

1) Enable PROFILE building mode
2) I don't have google heap-checker installed
3) run make. Compilation will fail with:

    In file included from /home/nkoenig/work/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:21:0,
                     from /home/nkoenig/work/gazebo/gazebo/common/Events.hh:21,
                     from /home/nkoenig/work/gazebo/gazebo/common/Diagnostics.cc:22:
    /home/nkoenig/work/gazebo/build/gazebo/gazebo_config.h:29:33: fatal error: google/heap-checker.h: No such file or directory
    compilation terminated.
    make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/Diagnostics.cc.o] Error

Should cmake return an error if PROFILE is enabled, but the google perftools are not installed?

I had to install `libgoogle-perftools-dev`
